Pre-Game Insights: Experts favor India to win based on their home advantage
India's recent form has been poor, with no wins in international matches this year
Kuwait's performance has been inconsistent, with wins against Bahrain, Syria, and Afghanistan but losses to Qatar and India
Sunil Chhetri, India's captain, is playing his final match for the national team
Post-Match Reflections: India's victory marks a significant step towards qualifying for the World Cup
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is being telecast live on the Sports18 Network and streamed live on Jio Cinema
